thread.title: Maguindanao councilor nabbed for drug trafficking
thread.title_full: Maguindanao councilor nabbed for drug trafficking

title: Maguindanao councilor nabbed for drug trafficking
text:
Nation ( Leaderboard Top ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1 Maguindanao councilor nabbed for drug trafficking By John Unson (philstar.com) | Updated February 23, 2017 - 3:36pm The councilor was cornered by agents of the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency in his hideout in Rajah Buayan town in Maguindanao. Philstar.com/File photo 
MAGUINDANAO, Philippines - Lawmen arrested on Wednesday another municipal councilor in Maguindanao province for large-scale drug trafficking, the second in just three weeks. 
Dennis Sandigan Utto was cornered by agents of the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency (PDEA) in his hideout in Rajah Buayan town in Maguindanao. 
Utto is an incumbent member of the Sangguning Bayan in Guindulungan town, also in the second district of Maguindanao. 
Relatives said he relocated to Barangay Mileb in Rajah Buayan last year after two attempts by authorities to arrest him for operating a drug ring that distributed methamphetamine hydrochloride (shabu) in the province. 
Bryan Babang, PDEA’s director for the Autonomous Region in Muslim Mindanao (ARMM), said they learned of Utto’s exact location in Barangay Mileb from informants, among them vigilant community elders. 
Utto was immediately clamped down in PDEA’s detention facility in Cotabato City, to be charged with violation of the Philippine Dangerous Drugs Act. Nation ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1 
The operation that resulted in the capture of Utto was preceded by the arrest three weeks ago in Cotabato City of Fatima Daud Baliwan. 
Baliwan is an incumbent member of the municipal council in Northern Kabuntalan in the first district of Maguindanao. 
Baliwan, who is president of the Association of Barangay Captains in Northern Kabuntalan, is an ex-officio member of the town’s municipal council. 
She is included in PDEA-ARMM’s list of top ten most wanted shabu dealer in Maguindanao. 
Also arrested along with Baliwan is her son, Norodin, and their two bodyguards. 
The agents who arrested them along a busy street in Cotabato City found shabu in their vehicle, a Toyota Land Cruiser bearing license plates XSF-868. Nation ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1
